content:
V Kaliforniji je in, če voziš hibrida. Pri nas je in, če voziš gas
guzzlerja. JD je ves čas trobil o vrnitvi k naravi. Lahko bi začel
kot vzornik.
author: anon-6533

content:
Se strinjam. Ta blog razkriva vso bedo teorije tople grede.
Razkriva tudi vso bedo SLO medijev, ki vztrajno in enostransko s
paranojo globalnega segrevanja perejo narodu mozgane.
author: anon-60266

content:
Jeffrey Sachs je velik optimist. tudi, če bi zgodil čudež, da bi
takoj prenehali uporabljati VSA fosilna goriva, bi trajalo nekaj
generacij, da bi se setava atmosfere vrnila na stanje, kot je bilo
na začetku 20 stol.
Klimatske spremembe imajo seveda tudi druge vzroke in strinjam se s
tistimi, ki trdijo, da je do njih prihajalo tudi brez vpliva
človekove dejavnosti/otoplitve in ohladitve v raznih geoloških
dobah/ Toda ta sprememba, ki je nastala v zadnjih 100 letih, pa je
zanesljivo posledica
sproščanja toplogrednih plinov, ki nastajajo pri sežiganju fosilnih
goriv.
Ker je svetovni trend naraščanja porabe energije, bi morali
Združeni narodi izdelati strategijo zmanjševanja porabe, pri čemer
bi jo morale razviten države takoj pričeti zmanjševati,nerazvite pa
bi jo lahko do določene mere še povečevale.Če bi se človeštvo
racionalno obnašalo, bi bil ta scenarij izvedljiv, tako pa ...

lahkoto pariral.

author: anon-17372

content:
Zadnja sprememba: bc123a 26.04.2007 13:07
Z gnusom in odporom pripenjam tale link - ampak vendarle mislim, da
si nekateri citati iz te kolumne zasluzijo branje, kot
protiutez:

Ann Coulter: Let them eat tofu!

www.anncoulter.com/c...rticle=172
author: bc123a

content:
bc123a je
napisal(a):
Z gnusom in odporom pripenjam tale link - ampak vendarle mislim, da
si nekateri citati iz te kolumne zasluzijo branje, kot
protiutez:

Ann Coulter: Let them eat tofu!

http://www.anncoulte...rticle=172<
/a>
No, tale Ann pa res bluzi, na polovici nisem mogel več
brati.

"There was more energy consumed in the manufacture, construction
and maintenance of Leonardo DiCaprio's Malibu home than is needed
to light the entire city of Albuquerque"

Umm ... needed to light the entire city for how long ? For
one night? For as long as it took to construct the house?
Že prvo se ne sliši prav verjetno, drugo je popolnoma nemogoče.
Ampak Ann couldn't care less, she's oh so smart and all...
author: anon-15342

content:
gregor666 je
napisal(a):


tudi v tem primeru se je potrebno najprej vprasati, ali je to sploh
slabo.

Poglej si kako zgleda moderna kitajska pokrajina in kako zgleda
npr. naša deželica. In po tem se vprašaj kaj je slabo in kaj je

author: anon-17140

content:
TadejK je
napisal(a):

 No, tale Ann pa res bluzi, na
polovici nisem mogel več brati.



True (note gnus and odpor above), ampak nekaj odstavkov je pa
zabavnih. evo izsekov:


...
They think they can live in a world of only Malibu and East Hampton
—
with no Trentons or Detroits. It does not occur to them that
someone has
to manufacture the tiles and steel and glass and solar panels that
go
into those "eco-friendly" mansions, and someone has to truck it all
to
their beachfront properties, and someone else has to transport all
the
workers there to build it. (And then someone has to drive the
fleets of
trucks delivering the pachysandra and bottled water every
day.)...

...If we have to live in a pure "natural" environment like the
Indians,
then our entire transcontinental nation can only support about 1
million
human beings. Sorry, fellas — 299 million of you are going to have
to go.

If we accept for purposes of argument their claim that the only way
the
human race can survive is with clean energy that doesn't emit
carbon
dioxide, environmentalists waited until they had safely destroyed
the
nuclear power industry to tell us that. This proves they never
intended
for us to survive. ...

...It seems not to have occurred to the jet set that when
California is
as poor as Mexico, they might have trouble finding a maid.
Without
trucking, packaging, manufacturing, shipping and refrigeration in
their
Bel-Air fantasy world, they'll be chasing the rear-end of an
animal
every time their stomachs growl and killing small animals for pelts
to
keep their genitals warm. ...


Evo, s temi odstavki se pa strinjam.

puščav in ljudi z dihalnimi pripomočki v velemestih. In rjav flek
nad Pacifikom, ki se ga vidi na satelitskih posnetkih, če seveda na
objektivu ni montiran liberalni filter.
